proposal: Understanding the importance of scalability, security, and interoperability in blockchain, Leca Good is pioneering with its Layer 2 solution. Congrats on gathering 13 holders in the ETH network! If you're looking to further empower your community, our suite of B2B tools, including DEX creation and a blockchain-based lottery, could align perfectly with your vision. Let's shape the future together, one block at a time.
